task.title: Changing your status
task.shortdesc: Your online status includes your availability and status message. The top of the application menu displays this information. Tap your current status to make changes. Other logged-in Sametime users can see your online status.

step.cmd: Tap your current availability status at the top of the menu to display the status message screen.

step.info:
After you log in, by default your status is "I am available". You can change your availability status to one of the following states:
I am available
I am away
I am in a meeting
Do not disturb

step.cmd: To add a custom message or more details to your status, tap Add more details to your status.

info.p: A text field opens where you can type a status message. For example, if you choose Away, you might add a custom message such as At a doctor's appointment.

You can add a custom message for each status. The message remains with that status until you change or remove the message. When you tap a status, you see all custom messages that you use with it. When you have multiple messages associated with a status, you can select which one to use by tapping it.
To remove a message, select the message and swipe left.
